description: Adds a CEF field and value to an artifact.

inputs.description: The artifact to which to apply the CEF field and value.
inputs.name: artifact_id

inputs.description: The name of the CEF field to add.
inputs.name: cef_field_name

inputs.description: The value to store in the CEF field. If left empty, this will make a CEF field containing None
inputs.name: cef_field_value
